modules.name: Steps
modules.description: Fusion of a comparator and a step generator

modules.name: Envelope Array
modules.description: Six related envelopes and gates

modules.name: Penta Sequencer
modules.description: A five step sequencer with five simultaneous outputs and tempo-synced slew

modules.name: Impulse Controller
modules.description: Decay envelopes propagate across a network of 24 nodes

modules.name: Signals
modules.description: A small six-channel oscilloscope for visualizing rack signals.

modules.name: Ranges
modules.description: Convert two input voltages into equal intervals.

modules.name: Hex Mod
modules.description: Six phase-related LFOs with rate sync and individual phase reset triggers.

modules.name: Collatz
modules.description: Clock-synchronized trigger burst generator, based on sequences of the Collatz conjecture.

modules.name: Strings
modules.description: Generates guitar chords from a button interface or CV. Implements bending, whammy bar and capo.

modules.name: Ouros
modules.description: A stereo phase injection oscillator, with polar waveform display.

modules.name: Pressed Duck
modules.description: A stereo six-channel dynamic compressing mixer with side-chain ducking, tanh saturation and ADAA.

modules.name: Preeeeeeeeeeessed Duck
modules.description: A stereo sixteen-channel dynamic compressing mixer with side-chain ducking, tanh saturation and ADAA.

modules.name: Flower Patch
modules.description: A 12-tone scale polar visualizer with FFT analysis.

modules.name: Magnets
modules.description: Simulate and interact with a small magnetic spin-lattice.

modules.name: Syncro
modules.description: Eight channel clock ratio generator.

modules.name: Nona
modules.description: Nine-channel CV gain/offset utility mixer.

modules.name: Decima
modules.description: Ten-channel gate sequencer with per-step probability.

modules.name: Morta
modules.description: Single-knob macro-controller utility with 16 simultaneous outputs in different ranges.

modules.name: Step Wave
modules.description: 8-step programmable sequencer/envelope generator with rhythmic displacement and variable shape.

modules.name: Arrange
modules.description: A seven channel sequencer with quantize/volt option per channel, and adjustable length.

modules.name: Tri Delay
modules.description: A three tap delay line.

modules.name: Tatami
modules.description: A stereo polyphonic wave-shaper and wave-folder with display and ADAA antialising.

modules.name: Cartesia
modules.description: A 4x4x4 sequencer for both quantized and non-quantized voltages, gates per step, and polyphonic outputs with stacked z-layer options.

modules.name: Junk DNA
modules.description: Input DNA codes to generate repetative genes, convert DNA sequence to numerous simultaneous gate signals.

modules.name: Picus
modules.description: Compose sequences of trigger bursts. Program a sequence of up to seven clock multiplier stages. Customizable trigger patterns.

modules.name: Node
modules.description: A two-channel stereo crossfading mixer.

modules.name: Weave
modules.description: A six note chord quantizer, with the abilty to weave the outputs into different permutations.

modules.name: Wonk
modules.description: Generate clock-synced and wonky modulationss in six phase-locked channels.

modules.name: Hammer
modules.description: A compact version of the Syncro eight channel clock ratio generator.

modules.name: Hub
modules.description: Two animated knob macro controllers with gain, offset, and knob range CV control.

modules.name: CV funk Blank 8HP
modules.description: Blank panel for CV funk.

modules.name: CV funk Blank 4HP
modules.description: Blank panel for CV funk.

modules.name: Rat
modules.description: Polyphonic ratio CV generator for exploring FMop ratios. Knob scales non-linearly around ratios, or optionally locks onto exact ratios.

modules.name: Count
modules.description: Counts up. Counts down. Auto-adapting display can handle very large numbers.

modules.name: Clpy
modules.description: Stereo polyphonic waveshaper folds your waves and clips them to a target CV value or audio input.

modules.name: Tuner
modules.description: Dual autocorrelation tuner and zero-centered waveform display.

modules.name: Alloy
modules.description: A metallic sound generator that uses Karplusâ€“Strong fractional delay networks to produce shimmering, percussive tones.
